xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 03 March 2014
xwikidoc.content: <SayAsh> has joined #ccm 07:45 <pradeeban> has joined #ccm 08:39 <Ravneet> has joined #ccm 08:44 <Ravneet> hi, i went through the gsoc ideas page...i can contribute towards "Mobile Web interface for PhenoTips" and "Mobile UI for the Pedigree tool" 08:44 <Ravneet> please let me know how can i start contributing towards it...thanks 08:52 <IonelPopescu> has joined #ccm 09:59 <vishnu93> has joined #ccm 10:20 <sdumitriu> Hi Ravneet, see https://gsoc.ccm.sickkids.ca/GoogleSummerOfCode/FirstSteps 11:54 <akif500> has joined #ccm 12:09 <reid_a> has joined #ccm 12:15 <qwebirc72953> has joined #ccm 13:02 <reid_a> has left #ccm 13:05 <reid_a> has joined #ccm 13:07 <reid_anderson> has joined #ccm 13:17 <reid_a> has joined #ccm 13:17 <vishnu93> has joined #ccm 13:25 <reid_a> has left #ccm 14:22 <reid_a> has joined #ccm 14:59 <IonelPopescu> has joined #ccm 17:26 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 17:27 <reid_a> has joined #ccm 17:28 <reid_a> Hey! Is there anyone around if I had a couple questions about Summer of Code stuff? 17:34 <sdumitriu> Hi reid_a 17:34 <sdumitriu> Sure 17:36 <reid_a> Hey, I was looking around your suggested ideas and the two related to modeling tumors really interested me. 17:37 <reid_a> I didn't see any links to the source code and was wondering if it was freely available. What I'm really asking is what would be the best way to start getting involved? 17:41 <Ravneet> has joined #ccm 17:46 <sdumitriu> I'm not sure about those ideas, since they're somebody else's projects 17:47 <sdumitriu> Best thing to do is to send an email to Quaid 17:48 <reid_a> Alright, I'll do that. Thanks for your time 17:50 <sdumitriu> You're welcome 18:34 <Ravneet> has joined #ccm 19:01 <Ravneet> sdumitriu_[Away], there? 19:02 <Ravneet> https://github.com/phenotips/phenotips i tried installing it...but it is giving some errors 20:46 <reid_a> has joined #ccm 20:49 <Ravneet> Errors that i'm getting: http://pastebin.com/h334XyeT 22:02 <reid_a> has joined #ccm 23:06 <reid_a> has joined #ccm
